alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:29PM EDT until March 25 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER TO RETURN THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... .A series of low pressure systems will affect the advisory area Thursday and Thursday night. The result will be a messy mix of rain, snow, sleet, and freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 3 and 5 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 7 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
